entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
